  1. City Council

City Council

  • 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of each month
  • Council Chambers 500 S. Oak Street Roanoke, TX 76262

Scooter Gierisch - Mayor, Term expires May 2027

Holly Gray - Mayor Pro Tem ,Ward 1, Term expires May

Hogan Page - Council Member Ward 1, Term expires May 2027

Brian Darby - Council Member Ward 2, Term expires May 2026

Bryan Moyers - Council Member Ward 2, Term expires May 2027

David Brundage - Council Member Ward 3, Term expires May 2026

David Thompson - Council Member Ward 3, Term expires May 202

Members of the City Council are elected for 3-year terms on a nonpartisan basis. The City Council is made up of 7 members, with 2 council members elected from each of the city’s 3 wards (PDF) and the mayor elected at large. public input form
